keywords.name: Hadesmod:bloodcast
keywords.description: A card with Bloodcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose 1 HP for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:corpsecast
keywords.description: A card with Corpsecast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Destroy 1 monster corpse for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:crescent rose
keywords.description: While held, gain [E] at the start of your turn and played Attacks Exhaust. When Activated, choose 1 of 3 Attacks to add into your hand.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:crocea mors
keywords.description: While held, gain 1 Block whenever you play a card. When Activated, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:fulcrum
keywords.description: While held, you have 1 additional Strength. When Activated, gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:gianduja
keywords.description: While held, every time you play 3 cards, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. When Activated, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:goldcast
keywords.description: A card with Goldcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose 10 Gold for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:gremlincast
keywords.description: A card with Gremlincast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Summon 1 Gremlin for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:leftcast
keywords.description: Instead of spending Energy on a card with Leftcast, discard that many cards from your hand, starting from the left.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:pestered
keywords.description: Pestered creatures take 25% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:potioncast
keywords.description: A card with Potioncast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose 1 Potion for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:relicast
keywords.description: A card with Relicast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose 1 random Relic for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:retaincast
keywords.description: Instead of spending Energy on a card with Retaincast, Exhaust that many cards with Retain from your hand, starting from the left.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:sharp retribution
keywords.description: While held, every time you play 3 cards, draw 1 card. When Activated, gain [E] .

keywords.name: Hadesmod:shivcast
keywords.description: A card with Shivcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Add 1 Shiv into your hand for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:strike
keywords.description: Any card with "Strike" in its name.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:walltorchcast
keywords.description: A card with Walltorchcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Snuff out 1 lit wall torch for each missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hadesmod:woundcast
keywords.description: A card with Woundcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Add 1 Wound into your hand for each missing Energy.
